meanings.sent1: The doweled chair was sturdy and well-built.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used doweled joints to secure the table legs.
meanings.sent3: The doweled bookshelf was so reliable, it never wobbled.
meanings.sent4: Her doweled friendship with Sarah was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The doweled connection between the two pieces was as strong as a bond.

meanings.sent1: The doweled cabinet was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: She admired the doweled edges of the wooden box.
meanings.sent3: The doweled puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His doweled collection of tools was neatly organized.
meanings.sent5: The doweled frame held the painting securely in place.
